abstract: A Long Island credit union that is offering fee-free checking for life said it has gotten an influx of new customers since Bank of America announced its monthly debit card fee.
snippet: A Long Island credit union that is offering fee-free checking for life said it has gotten an influx of new customers since Bank of America announced its monthly debit card fee.
lead_paragraph: A Long Island credit union, seeking to capitalize on growing antibank sentiment, is offering new customers guaranteed "fee free" checking accounts -- for life.

headline.main: Credit Union Pledges Fee-Free Checking for Life
